synopsis.text: Is it possible to encounter the impossible within a game? That's the question on everyone's mind as they delve into the world of Re'Union, a revamped version of the once popular MMORPG, Union. Legendary party Subaru, composed of childhood friends with extraordinary gaming abilities, was torn apart when Union shut down following a tragic in-game death. Fast forward six years, and high school student Haruto, a former Subaru member, finds himself face-to-face with Asahi, a dear friend who perished alongside the game. As the former team reunites to solve the mystery behind Asahi's presence, they embark on a thrilling and dangerous journey within Re'Union, ultimately testing the boundaries between reality and the digital realm. Will they uncover the truth behind Asahi's return, or will the enigmatic online game keep its secrets locked away forever?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
